Leaderboard.header: <title>Eighteen kingdoms</title><subtitle>The fight for glory roars on</subtitle>

rank.long: {rank, selectordinal, one {#st} two {#nd} few {#rd} other {#th}} place

questions.question: What are Intania First Date and Vishnu Camp? Do we have to go? What can we get from attending?
questions.answer: These two events are organized by Chula Engineering students for Intania 109. The goal is to help you meet new friends, get to know seniors and become familiar with the faculty before the semester begins. Although it isn't compulsory, we're sure that everyone who joins will get a memorable experience--so come join us!

questions.question: What are the differences between Intania First Date and CU First Date?
questions.answer: CU First Date is the first event for all freshmen from every faculty and is held in the morning. However, Intania First Date is an event only for Intania freshmen and is held in the afternoon of the same day.

questions.question: What are the schedules for Intania First Date?
questions.answer: Registration starts from 12:00 p.m. to 1:00 p.m. and activities run from 1:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m.

questions.question: How to dress for First Date?
questions.answer: There will be a dress code announcement soon. Stay tuned for the details on instagram account.

questions.question: What are the schedules and activities for Vishnu Camp?
questions.answer: Vishnu Camp is a 4-day camp, running from morning to evening. However, you can choose to stay overnight by completing a form. On the event day, registration starts at 8:00 a.m. and activities end between 5:00 p.m. and 8:30 p.m. A detailed schedule will be announced soon.

questions.question: Is attending certain parts or days allowed?
questions.answer: It is recommended to join every day (better not miss it!), but if you're unavailable, that's totally fine--just fill out the form the days you can join.

questions.question: How do we get to the camp?
questions.answer: You can get to the camp by BTS or MRT. A video guide on how to get to the faculty will be posted soon--stay tuned on instagram account!

questions.question: Where is the camp held? If we stay overnight, where will we sleep?
questions.answer: The camp is held at Faculty of Engineering, Chulalongkorn University. If you stay overnight, you will sleep in the classroom. Each room accommodates around 30-40 people, with seperates building for males and females.

questions.question: What are the activities for each day?
questions.answer: The activity schedules will be posted soon--stay tuned!

questions.question: If we don't know anyone yet, will we feel lonely?
questions.answer: Definitely not! There are a lot of activities designed to help you get to know each other. The staff will be there to take care of you and make you feel like a part of family.

RegistrationAnnouncement.title: Registration point
footer: Registration location may differ from person to person.

header.title: Explore
header.subtitle: Discover what Chula Engineering has to offer.

map.title: Map
map.subtitle: Your guide to Intania First Date. Get to know your new home.

clubs.title: Clubs
clubs.subtitle: From sports to robots, what club will be your calling?

presentation.title: Presentation
presentation.subtitle: Slides with information you’ll need to succeed in this faculty.

Faculty.alt: Map of the Faculty of Engineering, Chulalongkorn University.
Faculty.instruction: Tap a building to view club map

Building.instruction: Tap a booth to view club details

header.title: Games
header.subtitle: Can you bring glory to your kingdom?

bingo.title: Bingo
bingo.subtitle: Visit a club with a code you can show, and get the legendary five-in-a-row!

predictions.title: Predictions
predictions.subtitle: Your guess is your destiny in the Tower of Heavenly Fates.

footer.scoring: Scores depend on how many people in your kingdom answered correctly.

body.0: You’ll see a question for the morning and the afternoon of each day. Submit a short answer as a prediction before the time limit.
body.2: You’re free to guess! Your answer doesn’t have to match others’ in your kingdom.

body.0: Scores are based on ranking the number of people who answered correctly in each kingdom.
body.1: The more people in your kingdom answered correctly, the higher the score.

BingoCard.empty: Visit booth clubs to unlock bingo square

playing.title: How to play
playing.body: You start with a hidden 5×5 bingo table. Reveal a random bingo square by visiting a club and showing staff your QR code.

body.2: Completing the entire table awards 50 additional points
body.3: Get bonus points if the scan didn’t reveal any squares on the table

QRCodeDialog.desc: Show your QR code to the club staff to get bingo points

social.title: Stay connected with your friends
social.subtitle: Tap a platform and enter your username!

FriendCodeDialog.title: Add with code
FriendCodeDialog.desc: Ask your friend to go to Account > Add Friend > Your QR code and copy the code below the QR code.

desc.0: Ask your friend to go to Account > Add Friend > Your QR code and use your phone to scan your friend’s QR code.
desc.1: If you can’t use the camera, tap Add with code.

UnfriendDialog.title: Remove from friends
UnfriendDialog.desc: You will no longer see “{friend}” in your friend list. We won’t notify {friend}.
